This work was presented at the *Annual Research Conclave (2023)* at Azim Premji University, Bengaluru. As a research assistant, I helped with documentation, data visualization, and with executing the regression analysis for the project.[^1]

[^1]: This is unpublished work, only uploaded here to give the reader a better sense of my experience as a research assistant during this stint.
